about.title: I'm Software Engineer
descr: I like all things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between, so I'm developing with a passion any kind of web applications or websites with minimalistic design and simplicity. My goal is to build products with high performance and quality.

Well-organized and person, independent employee with high attention to detail, problem solver, and perfectionist. Fan of sports and any outdoor activities, also like reading literature about marketing & psychology.

Graduated from university have a bachelor's degree in economic cybernetics as well as a master's degree in economic informatics, has science work about spreading information in social networks (data analysis & forecast).
I have been developing for more than 5 years and am open to new directions and opportunities.

directions.title: Web-development
directions.descr: Creating web applications (SPA, SSR), responsive and cross-browser sites, and working with different APIs.

directions.title: UX/UI design
directions.descr: Design minimalist and simple sites with a big variety of animation effects.

directions.title: Analytics
directions.descr: Since I graduated from economic cybernetics, I can analyze the data and draw conclusions based on them, building various models of processes.

services.sectionNote: Of course, I can provide other services that are related to the Internet, just contact me for the further details

services.title: Design
services.descr: Design simple and minimalistic UI/UX interfaces (Figma)

services.title: Development
services.descr: Develop web applications and sites with modern technologies (React, Vue)

services.title: Seo
services.descr: Promotion of sites as SEO in different search engines (Google, Yandex)

services.title: Support
services.descr: Support for existing projects bug fixing (AEM, WordPress, OpenCart)

skills.title: Work experience
descr: The main side of my experience in the web is the front-end side (client side of the web).

HTML5, CSS3, JS, building small and medium web apps with Vue or React, features, animations, working with APIs, creating and designing responsive websites. Also engaged in website promotion as SEO (Google, Yandex). Have experience working with such CMS as WordPress, OpenCart and AEM.

Have large plenty of freelance projects with various stacks including full-stack development (NodeJS, NuxtJS, Express, MongoDB). As well as I worked in a start-up company that was engaged in the search and sale of tickets for any kind of transport. Now I'm working in a large outsourcing company.
All my skills and stack which I used while developing are placed on a cube that you are able to move.

projects.stack: UX / UI / HTML / CSS / JS / SEO

projects.title: nom
projects.descr: Web application for food delivery to customers from different restaurant vendors

contacts.title: just say hello!
contacts.descr: I am interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other requests or questions, just mail me, and I'll try my best to get back to you!
